hero.title: The world is your talent pool
hero.subtitle: We transform your vision into high-performing teams, anywhere in the world. Global Work Hub connects businesses with the best international professionals, selected, supervised and ready to perform from day one.
hero.tagline: A simple, fast and ultra-competitive approach that boosts your performance without exploding your costs.

why.title: What we do differently
why.subtitle: Where others delegate, we integrate. Where others automate, we accompany.

one.title: One point of contact, zero risk
one.body: Your payments, contracts and exchanges go exclusively through Global Work Hub. We protect you from any legal, administrative or operational risk. Unlike platforms that limit themselves to an intermediary role, we assume, supervise and secure every step.

two.title: No commitment, 100% trust
two.body: Our offer is commitment-free: if you're not satisfied, you're free to leave at any time. Yet, 100% of our clients have chosen to continue with us. Our collaboration renewal rate speaks for itself: trust is our best contract.

three.title: Guaranteed replacement
three.body: We commit to providing immediate replacement if the provider is not up to par, to intervene quickly in case of malfunction, and to support your company in the evolution of your needs.

services.title: An all-in-one platform for your international teams

recruitment.subtitle: From sourcing to daily follow-up, we manage everything
recruitment.paragraph: Identification of qualified profiles, rigorous preselection, tests and interviews, complete onboarding, operational follow-up and monthly KPI reporting.
bullets: Identification of qualified profiles in +15 countries
Preselection, technical tests and in-depth interviews
Complete onboarding and integration into your teams
Daily operational follow-up and monthly KPI reporting

talentPortage.subtitle: Simple and legal collaboration without administrative constraints
talentPortage.paragraph: Clear contracts, international compliance and complete administrative support. You recruit, we manage payroll portage, payroll and legal obligations in each country.
bullets: EOR contracts and guaranteed legal compliance
One point of contact for all countries

adminManagement.subtitle: Complete administrative and organizational coherence
adminManagement.paragraph: We centralize contract management, payroll and reporting for your international teams. You keep control without the operational burden.

accompaniment.subtitle: Effective HR strategy and customized international expansion
accompaniment.paragraph: We analyze your organization and support you in structuring your teams and remote work processes. Our managers and business experts guide you in implementing an effective HR strategy and a customized international expansion plan.

home.title: Global Work Hub - International Recruitment & HR Outsourcing
home.description: Recruit the best international talent with Global Work Hub. Complete solution for recruitment and HR outsourcing to boost your growth.

why.title: Why Global Work Hub? - Reliable HR Outsourcing
why.description: Discover why Global Work Hub is the ideal solution for your HR outsourcing. Flexibility, reliability and stability for your international teams.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials - Global Work Hub
testimonials.description: Discover testimonials from our satisfied clients. Global Work Hub transforms international recruitment with concrete and measurable results.

specialites.title: Talents in all strategic domains
specialites.subtitle: We recruit qualified professionals in key sectors of your growth

items.title: Support and customer service
items.description: Multilingual assistance (FR/EN/AR), outsourced support centers, ticket management and customer satisfaction tracking.

items.title: Digital marketing and e-commerce
items.description: Community management, brand content, SEO/SEA, advertising campaigns (Google Ads, Meta Ads), online store and marketplace management.

items.title: Web development and IT
items.description: Full stack, front-end, back-end developers, integrators, system and network administrators, software maintenance and IT technical support.

items.title: Administrative and accounting management
items.description: Billing management, customer follow-up, reminders, basic accounting, bank reconciliations, payroll management and HR compliance.

items.title: Design, communication and creation
items.description: Graphic design, UX/UI design, motion design, web writing, storytelling, video production, visual identity and graphic charter.

items.title: Technical trades and engineering
items.description: Industrial draftsmen (CAD/CAM/CAE), method engineers, mechanical, electrical, 3D modelers, product designers, study managers and technical project coordinators.

talentsShowcase.title: Worker showcases
talentsShowcase.description: Discover international profiles pre-qualified and supervised by Global Work Hub, available in key sectors: health, logistics, construction, administration and technology. They are ready to join your teams and contribute to your projects, with integrated HR support in more than 15 countries.
